reference_summary:
Beauty Treats Eye shadow NUDES & SMOKY 2pc Palette
Beauty Treats
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.51 x 4.02 x 0.98 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B01B6WTCCM_US', 'UPC': '784179131863 755332577347 676768409012'}
Truly unreal this is really good no joke just as good as high end brands no lie. I was truly shocked but what can it hurt to try and see for yourself. This was a huge shock really good if you had blind folds on you would NOT know the differences between this and visesrts.
Just because things are cheaper doesn't mean they are not as good or better then higher priced brands
Beauty Treats Eye Shadow MODERN MATTE 2 pc Palette
Beauty Treats
{'Brand': 'Beauty Treats', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.51 x 4.02 x 0.98 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B01B6WXOEY_US', 'UPC': '784179908755 755332499977 676768409036'}
These truly SHOCKED ME.. These are just as good as high end that's no lie.  I have visearts and when I bought these I was truly shocked. They truly can stand with the high end brands and hold their own.  Honestly
Just because something is cheaper doesn't mean its not good or better then higher brands.
Belen Thermal Temperature Color Changing Gel Nail Polish Soak Off UV LED Nail Lacquer 4219

I love the way the colors change however I hate the way it makes your real nails even with a clear protector on 2 coats before hand it's still makes your real nails brittle soft and very unhealthy looking.
I wish ida knew it was going to make my real nails brittle

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary**

- **Product Interest:** Cosmetics, with a significant focus on eye makeup, particularly eyeshadow palettes. The user's interest is expanding to include nail products.
- **Brand Perception:** Strong advocate for affordable beauty options, showcasing a discerning and open-minded attitude toward product quality.
- **Preference for Performance:** Prioritizes effective performance in products that rival higher-end alternatives. Actively endorses budget-friendly items that yield surprising results, including in nail care, while maintaining a realistic view of product effects on health and aesthetics.
- **Positive Attitude:** Emphasizes optimism in finding high-quality affordable products, reflecting delight in positive experiences. This contrasts with a realistic approach to potential downsides, particularly concerning nail health.
- **Engagement:** Actively shares detailed reviews and personal insights on product efficacy and value, establishing a sense of community within the beauty space. Values transparency in feedback, openly discussing both positives and negatives.
- **Recent Interaction:** The user recently expressed satisfaction with a new eyeshadow purchase, noting ease of use and effective results. This reinforces their continued commitment to advocating for high-quality cosmetics that are accessible, while providing honest assessments of product performance.

Through their reviews and experiences, the user enhances their role as a trusted voice in the beauty community, promoting affordability without sacrificing quality.
